page.title: 04LEISURE LIFE IN DUDLEY (1)
page.content: Dudley has a comprehensive programme of concerts,sports events,drama,and art displays.Facilities include:- Dudley Town Hall where many concerts exhibitions and displays take place.Next door is the main Dudley library which has a good reference section,information service and lends books,records and cassettes.There is a smaller library in Netherton.Central Dudley also has a cinema called the Plaza which has two theatres averaging 500-600 visitors a day.Next door is a large bingo hall and amusement arcade. Dudley also has a casino and night club.For the more active,Dudley Leisure Centre offers a wide range of activities.It includes sports halls, squash courts,and swimming pools.Three parks provide outside facilities. Buffery Park-football pitch,bowling green,putting green,6 tennis courts.
